description: I work closely with an interdisciplinary team of engineers, mathematicians, and physicists.
I develop the a new post-quantum cryptography algorithm.
I architect the object-oriented design of the new system.
I develop and maintain the documentation.
I interview stakeholders to extract functional and non-functional requirements.
For speed and efficiency, the codebase is written in C++.
I work with encoding, compression, serialization, and optimization algorithms.
I use multi-threading, serialization, and compression methods to improve performance, imporve time complexity, and reduce the space complexity of our system.
I also conduct research to futher optimize our systems components.
I worked with an international fleet management company to develop a prototype.
The prototype automatically detected damage to fleet vehicles.
I offered advice to establish ideal conditions in the photobooth.
The prototype was built using C++ and OpenCV.
I tutored Introduction to Programming, Data Structures, Object Oriented Programming, Algorithms, and more.
Additionally, I mentored students and played a leadership role in the center.
